Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), appstream <!nocheck>, meson, pkgconf, glslang-tools, mesa-common-dev, libdbus-1-dev, libdrm-dev, libvulkan-dev, libopengl-dev, libglfw3-dev, libspdlog-dev, libx11-dev, libwayland-dev, libxnvctrl-dev, libxrandr-dev, python3-mako:native, libxkbcommon-dev
Description: Vulkan/OpenGL overlay for monitoring FPS, temperatures, CPU/GPU load and more MangoHud is a highly customizable overlay for Vulkan and OpenGL application to monitoring FPS, temperatures, CPU/GPU load and more.
Package-List: mangoapp deb misc optional arch=any mangohud deb misc optional arch=any mangohudctl deb misc optional arch=any mangoplot deb misc optional arch=all
